verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5986>Amos,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was among the <S%H5349>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H8620>Tekoa,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2372>saw<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7580>roar<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> shall <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> shall <S%H3001>wither.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> they have <S%H1758>threshed<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with <S%H2742>threshing<s%> instruments of <S%H1270>iron:<s%>
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael,<s%> which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1130>Benhadad.<s%>

I will <S%H7665>break<s%> also the <S%H1280>bar<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> from the <S%H1237>plain<s%> of <S%H206>Aven,<s%> and him that <S%H8551>holds<s%> the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> shall go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> to <S%H7024>Kir,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> they <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captive<s%> the <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H1546>captivity,<s%> to <S%H5462>deliver<s%> them up to <S%H123>Edom:<s%>
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof:

And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> from <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and him that <S%H8551>holds<s%> the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> from <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H6138>Ekron:<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> they <S%H5462>delivered<s%> up the <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H1546>captivity<s%> to <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not the <S%H251>brotherly<s%> <S%H1285>covenant:<s%>
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> he did <S%H7291>pursue<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and did <S%H7843>cast<s%> off all <S%H7356>pity,<s%> and his <S%H639>anger<s%> did <S%H2963>tear<s%> <S%H5703>perpetually,<s%> and he <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> for <S%H5331>ever:<s%>
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and for <S%H702>four,<s%> I will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> away the punishment thereof; <S%H5921>because<s%> they have <S%H1234>ripped<s%> up the women with <S%H2030>child<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> that they might <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> their <S%H1366>border:<s%>

But I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof, with <S%H8643>shouting<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle,<s%> with a <S%H5591>tempest<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H5492>whirlwind:<s%>
And their <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> he and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
